body_html:
The reason that there is no gradient in your first example is that complex numbers haven't been included in the gradient code for tf.cast.
Right now it only returns a gradient if you convert between floats.
This is something that should be fixed, in my opinion.
Here's the code that would need to be changed:

tensorflow/tensorflow/python/ops/math_grad.py

Line 746 in e95f4e7

@ops.RegisterGradient("Cast")

body:
The reason that there is no gradient in your first example is that complex numbers haven't been included in the gradient code for `tf.cast`.
Right now it only returns a gradient if you convert between floats.
This is something that should be fixed, in my opinion.
Here's the code that would need to be changed: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/e95f4e760c6b6713b6b686ebeff9a1586a5831dd/tensorflow/python/ops/math_grad.py#L746
